descript.abstract: This polygon dataset represents property lines and areas, along with associated property information for Somerville, MA.
descript.purpose: This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.

idinfo.accconst: Unrestricted Access Online: Access is granted to licensee only. Available to Tufts University affiliates.
idinfo.useconst: For educational and non-commercial use only.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.1 (Build 7600) ; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

procstep.procdesc: Changed name of file from Parcels2004 to SomervilleParcels04.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Alpha-Numeric code for Map, Lot and Block Number
Unique parcel identifier assigned to each individual property corresponding to an a,lpha suffix on the MBL number
attr.attrdefs: Tufts University. Geographic Information Systems Center.

attr.attrdef: Unit number of the building associated with the parcel
